thread.title: Chance The Rapper Wins Best New Hip-Hop Artist At iHeartRadio Music Awards
thread.title_full: Chance The Rapper Wins Best New Hip-Hop Artist At iHeartRadio Music Awards

author: Rose Lilah
title: Chance The Rapper Wins Best New Hip-Hop Artist At iHeartRadio Music Awards
text:
Home > Music > Chance The Rapper Wins Best New Hip-Hop Artist At iHeartRadio Music Awards Chance The Rapper Wins Best New Hip-Hop Artist At iHeartRadio Music Awards 0 0 Posted by Rose Lilah , Mar 5, 2017 at 08:55pm Chance The Rapper takes home Best New Hip-Hop Artist at the iHeart Radio Music Awards. 
The iHeartRadio Music Awards are going down right now, you can catch them airing live on TNT, TBS and TruTV. The annual awards show leans more towards pop than hip-hop, but nonetheless there are spaces for hip-hop artists to take home awards. 
Case in point, Chance the Rapper snagged another award for Best New Hip-Hop Artist, as deemed by iHeart Radio-- this follows up his Grammy win of a similar (but not exactly the same) nature a couple of weeks back. Chance was up against Kevin Gates , Desiigner , D.R.A.M. and Kent Jones for Best New Hip-Hop Artist-- do you think they made the right choice? 
Bryson Tiller is also taking home an award this evening, for Best New RnB Artist. Tiller was nominated alongside Belly, Dreezy, Kayla Brianna and Ro James. 
Let us know what you think of these winners in the comments and stay tuned as the evening goes on; we'll keep you posted with the full list of iHeart Radio Music Award winners. < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Mar 5, 2017 at 08:55pm 0 Views
